definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
to dredge/to clear away obstruction/thin/sparse/scanty/distant (relation)/not close/to neglect/negligent/to present a memorial to the Emperor/commentary/annotation
close and distant, rich and poor (idiom); everyone/all possible relations

sentences.english: The language of space was the key sign for degree of intimacy of human relationship.
sentences.chinese: 空間語言是人際關係親疏程度的重要標誌。

sentences.english: He has created a hierarchy largely determined by closeness to the Wu clan.
sentences.chinese: 他以與吳氏關係親疏建立了一套等級制度。

sentences.english: They are both cousins of his, but not of the same degree of propinquity .
sentences.chinese: 他們兩個都是他的表親，但在血統上親疏不同。

sentences.english: In short, the salute must first consider the other side before with their affinities.
sentences.chinese: 總之，施禮之前必須首先考慮對方與自己的親疏關係。

sentences.english: I've been at a hen do where we were all asked to stand in a line, ranking ourselves according to how close we were to the bride.
sentences.chinese: 我們被要求按照跟新娘關係的親疏來排成一排”。

sentences.english: Analyse the hydrodynamic relation among water-taking points according to the near or far relation.
sentences.chinese: 根據親疏關係，分析了水點間的水力聯繫。

definition: noble and lowly/high versus low social hierarchy of ruler to people, father to son, husband to wife in Confucianism
name and reality/how sth is portrayed and what it is actually like
Classic of Rites (same as 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4])
variant of 勸誡|劝诫[quan4 jie4]
variant of 輾轉|辗转[zhan3 zhuan3]
